member.name: M:ClientApp.CustomAuthenticationStateProvider.Login(System.String)
member.summary: This method should be called upon a successful user login, and it will store the user's JWT token in SecureStorage. Upon saving this it will also notify .NET that the authentication state has changed which will enable authenticated views

member.name: M:ClientApp.CustomAuthenticationStateProvider.Logout
member.summary: This method should be called to log-off the user from the application, which simply removed the stored token and then notifies of the change
